WorkItem.ClosedComment: Took a closer look at the nant source and dug around for alternatives. Truthfully there is nothing really other than nant core and its quite a bit of work to tease out. For the indefinite future nant core will remain a part of KerbalData to support file search mask strings and helpers.
WorkItem.Description: Simplify and convert nant file management helpers into classes inside of kerbaldata. According to the [nant license](http://nant.sourceforge.net/license.html) this should be allowed.
